title: The 2018 Gratitude Special
description:
Heroes come in all shapes and sizes: little girls, traveling dogs and men who save strangers from disaster... on the Snap Judgment 2018 Gratitude Special.

Season 9 Episode 33
itunes:title: The 2018 Gratitude Special
itunes:subtitle: THE BEST LITTLE SWIMMER Terry Galloway is ten years old and absolutely hot for summer camp. The only problem is, her family can’t afford it. But after she fails a hearing test at school, Terry learns that she is deaf -- and also eligible to attend The Li
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
